short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your site approved by Google AdSense in 1st attempt. AdSense Approval Guide With Video Tutorials, Resources and Up To Date Tips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This checklist with Google AdSense Approval tips, step-by-step Guide, and resources was compiled after I binge-watched YouTube tutorial videos and read multiple blog posts over several days.

I have compiled the best strategies and methods into a checklist guide to help you create, optimize, and submit your website to AdSense for review without having to do the research.

Although we cover some useful website niche selection & setup tips, Content writing formulas best for AdSense Approval, and some tips for getting higher revenue, I haven't gone deeply into the site SEO for AdSense, but I suggest using a Google Search Console, Google Analytics, and Google Trends to help you write quality content and pick trending topics in your niche.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
This Checklist Will Be Updated Regularly
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Inside you'll find:-

Basic Requirements #1
Niche of your blog #2
Site Theme & Design #3
Create Helpful Content #4
Important Pages #5
Good Navigation #6
Submit your site GSC #7
Extra Tips #8


There are a few of the best Video Tutorials Included too (❁´◡`❁)

Install the 2024 ▷ AdSense Approval Checklist [Updated] Extension, by following these easy steps:

1)	Click the “Add to Chrome” button
2)	On the next screen, click the “Add Extension” button
3)	That’s it, the extension is now available and ready to use!


Recommended Extensions That May Help You
Grammarly- To fix grammatical errors in your blog content.
Ubersuggest - SEO and Keyword Discovery

This extension has been developed by utilizing a collection of top tips from Blogger and content writers Experts who use Google AdSense to Make Money with their Blogs and curated right into one simple to use and functional AdSense Approval Checklist tool.
